rules.statement: Mind layer components (src/mind/**/*.py) MUST NOT import database session infrastructure (get_session)
rules.rationale: Mind defines law but never executes. Database access is execution, not governance.

rules.statement: Mind layer components (src/mind/**/*.py) MUST NOT write to filesystem
rules.rationale: Mind may read .intent/ but never mutates. Law does not modify itself.

rules.statement: Mind layer components (src/mind/**/*.py) MUST NOT import or invoke Body layer (src/body)
rules.rationale: Mind defines rules. Body executes. Mind never invokes execution.

rules.statement: Mind layer components (src/mind/**/*.py) MUST NOT import or invoke Will layer (src/will)
rules.rationale: Mind defines rules. Will decides. Mind never makes decisions.

rules.statement: Body layer components (src/body/**/*.py) MUST NOT evaluate constitutional rules directly
rules.rationale: Body executes actions. Mind evaluates rules. Body never decides legality.

rules.statement: Will layer components (src/will/**/*.py) MUST NOT import get_session directly
rules.rationale: Will decides and orchestrates. Body executes. Will delegates infrastructure access to Body.

rules.statement: Will layer components (src/will/**/*.py) SHOULD delegate filesystem operations to Body
rules.rationale: Will may read for context but should not implement filesystem operations directly.

rules.statement: Will layer orchestration components SHOULD import and delegate to Body services
rules.rationale: Will orchestrates by delegating to Body, not by implementing directly.

rules.statement: API layer components (src/api/**/*.py) MUST NOT import get_session directly
rules.rationale: API is entrypoint boundary. All work must route through Will, not directly to infrastructure.

rules.statement: API route handlers SHOULD delegate all logic to Will layer
rules.rationale: API translates requests to Will. API never implements business logic.

rules.statement: API layer components SHOULD NOT directly import Body services
rules.rationale: API should route through Will, not bypass to Body directly.

rules.statement: Body layer components (src/body/**/*.py) MUST NOT import or invoke Will layer (src/will)
rules.rationale: Body executes. Will decides. Execution never chooses strategy.

rules.statement: Mind layer components (src/mind/**/*.py) MUST NOT perform I/O operations or invoke actions
rules.rationale: Mind is law. Law never executes itself.

rules.statement: Shared infrastructure components (src/shared/**/*.py) MUST NOT make strategic decisions or orchestrate workflows
rules.rationale: Shared provides utilities. Utilities are tools, not decision-makers.
